Control Name: 5.12.5 The application team has a clear view on responsibilities and individual/group access levels for this workload.
Control Statement: Application roles and responsibility model need to be defined covering the different access level of each operational function (e.g publish production release, access customer data, manipulate database records). It's in the interest of the application team to include central functions (e.g. SecOps, NetOps, IAM) into this view.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.12 What security controls do you have in place for access to Azure infrastructure?
